title: Battlefield: Hardline - FitGirl
description:
Battlefield: Hardline (True MULTI12) [FitGirl Repack, 100% Lossless, Selective Download - 23.3 GB]


::Information::


Release Date: March 17, 2015; Cracked - August 13, 2015
Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, First-person, 3D
Developer: Visceral Games
Publisher: Electronic Arts
Platform: PC [Repack]
Engine: Frostbite 3

Interface Language: English, German, Spanish, Italian, French, Portuguese-Brazil, Polish, Russian, Japanese, Czech, Korean, Traditional Chinese
Audio Language: English, German, Spanish, Italian, French, Portuguese-Brazil, Polish, Russian, Japanese
Crack: built-in (CPY)


::Repack Features::


Based on Battlefield.Hardline-CPY ISO release: cpy-bfh.iso (51,993,825,280 bytes)
100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
Game version is v1.07.15.00
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
Selective download of speech packs - you can download & install only those you need (at least one speech pack must be downloaded)
The smallest lossless repack in the world (compressed from 48.4 to 23.3 GB for any single language)
Installation takes 1.5-3.5 hours (depending on your system: number of CPU cores and HDD speed. Make sure you don't have high load on your HDD while installing & that you don't use CPU-heavy software at the time.)
After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
HDD space after installation: 37~48 GB depending on selected speech packs (~50 GB during installation)
Repack by FitGirl
